rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains a neutral economic projection using a positive superlative ('record').
The segment reports on financial/trade metrics ('record of up to 5.15 million tons', 'value of exports'), which are Neutral.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports positive economic facts without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states exports will end at a record, describing a future possibility/economic outcome.
